  1. from cms.plugin_pool import plugin_pool
  2. from cms.plugin_base import CMSPluginBase
  3. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  4. from models import Text
  5. from cms.plugins.text.forms import TextForm
  6. from cms.plugins.text.widgets.wymeditor_widget import WYMEditor
  7. from cms.plugins.text.utils import plugin_tags_to_user_html
  8. from django.forms.fields import CharField
  9. from cms.plugins.text.settings import USE_TINYMCE
  10. from django.conf import settings
  13. class TextPlugin(CMSPluginBase):
  14. model = Text
  15. name = _("Text")
  16. form = TextForm
  17. render_template = "cms/plugins/text.html"
  18. change_form_template = "cms/plugins/text_plugin_change_form.html"
  20. def get_editor_widget(self, request, plugins):
  21. """
  22. Returns the Django form Widget to be used for
  23. the text area
  24. """
  25. if USE_TINYMCE and "tinymce" in settings.INSTALLED_APPS:
  26. from cms.plugins.text.widgets.tinymce_widget import TinyMCEEditor
  27. return TinyMCEEditor(installed_plugins=plugins)
  28. else:
  29. return WYMEditor(installed_plugins=plugins)
  31. def get_form_class(self, request, plugins):
  32. """
  33. Returns a subclass of Form to be used by this plugin
  34. """
  35. # We avoid mutating the Form declared above by subclassing
  36. class TextPluginForm(self.form):
  37. pass
  38. widget = self.get_editor_widget(request, plugins)
  39. TextPluginForm.declared_fields["body"] = CharField(widget=widget, required=False)
  40. return TextPluginForm
  42. def get_form(self, request, obj=None, **kwargs):
  43. plugins = plugin_pool.get_text_enabled_plugins(self.placeholder, self.page)
  44. form = self.get_form_class(request, plugins)
  45. kwargs['form'] = form # override standard form
  46. return super(TextPlugin, self).get_form(request, obj, **kwargs)
  48. def render(self, context, instance, placeholder):
  49. context.update({
  50. 'body': plugin_tags_to_user_html(instance.body, context, placeholder),
  51. 'placeholder': placeholder,
  52. 'object': instance
  53. })
  54. return context
  56. def save_model(self, request, obj, form, change):
  57. obj.clean_plugins()
  58. super(TextPlugin, self).save_model(request, obj, form, change)
  60. plugin_pool.register_plugin(TextPlugin)
